body: Yeah, I am fine with a print uses flag for debugging these issues that is off by default. But it was getting hard to read when uses would refer to nodes whose id was not being printed, and this was confusing people.
body_html: Yeah, I am fine with a print uses flag for debugging these issues that is off by default. But it was getting hard to read when uses would refer to nodes whose id was not being printed, and this was confusing people.
body_text: Yeah, I am fine with a print uses flag for debugging these issues that is off by default. But it was getting hard to read when uses would refer to nodes whose id was not being printed, and this was confusing people.
